messages.content: What type of license is the ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream project distributed under?
The ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream project is distributed under the Apache License, Version 2.0.
What is the purpose of the Apache License?
The Apache License is a permissive open source software license that allows users to freely use, modify, and distribute the software, subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the license.
Does the Apache License grant patent rights to users of the ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream project?

Yes, the Apache License grants a perpetual, worldwide, non-exclusive, no-charge, royalty-free, irrevocable (except as stated in the license) patent license to users of the ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream project.
What are the requirements for redistributing the Work or Derivative Works under the Apache License?

When redistributing the Work or Derivative Works under the Apache License, you must include a copy of the License, state any changes made to files, retain copyright, patent, trademark, and attribution notices, and include the contents of the NOTICE file (if provided) in the distribution.
Does the Apache License provide any warranty for the ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream project?

No, the Apache License explicitly states that the Work and Contributions are provided on an "AS IS" basis, without warranties or conditions of any kind, unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing.
What is the limitation of liability under the Apache License?

The Apache License states that Contributors shall not be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use the Work, except in cases of deliberate and grossly negligent acts or as required by applicable law.
How can users apply the Apache License to their own work?

Users can apply the Apache License to their own work by attaching the boilerplate notice provided in the Appendix of the license, with their own identifying information, and including the text in the appropriate comment syntax for the file format.
What is ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream?
ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream is a node in ComfyUI that integrates the Moondream2 multimodal large language model from Hugging Face.
What is the purpose of the warning about additional Python code being downloaded and executed?
The warning is to inform users that using the ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream node requires trusting the creator, as additional Python code will be downloaded from Hugging Face and executed.
What are some of the updates made to ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream?

Some updates include passing proper prompts to the model, updating the model/code to moondream2, ending support for moondream1, adding a multi-prompt feature, model revision selector, model temperature selector, and supporting custom model folder locations.
How can users resolve the 'Tensor size mismatch' error when using newer versions of transformers?
Users can resolve the 'Tensor size mismatch' error by selecting the moondream2 model within the node to receive the updated files from Hugging Face.
What is the new multi-prompt feature in ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream?
The new multi-prompt feature allows users to ask several questions at once by placing each prompt on a new line.
What are the expected files in the ComfyUI/models/moondream2 folder for custom model locations?

The expected files in the ComfyUI/models/moondream2 folder for custom model locations include model.safetensors, config.json, tokenizer.json, tokenizer_config.json, generation_config.json, configuration_moondream.py, modeling_phi.py, moondream.py, and vision_encoder.py.
What is the license for the ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream repository?
The license for the ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream repository is Apache 2.0.
What is the purpose of creating a bug report for ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream?
The purpose of creating a bug report is to provide a clear and concise description of the bug to help improve ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream.
What information should be included in the bug report for ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream?
The bug report should include the current error messages from the console windows instead of the ones from the browser.
What desktop information should be provided in the bug report for ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream?
The bug report should include the OS information, for example, iOS.
What Python packages information should be included in the bug report for ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream?
The bug report should include the output of running the command 'python.exe -m pip freeze | findstr "timm transformers einops torch"' within the ComfyUI python environment folder.
How can I provide the Python packages information for the bug report?

To provide the Python packages information, run the command 'python.exe -m pip freeze | findstr "timm transformers einops torch"' within the ComfyUI python environment folder and post the output in the bug report.
Should I include browser error messages in the bug report for ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream?
No, you should not include browser error messages in the bug report. Instead, post the current error messages from the console windows.
What is the expected outcome of submitting a bug report for ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream?
The expected outcome of submitting a bug report is to help the developers identify and fix the issue, ultimately improving the ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream software.
What is the purpose of the custom issue template in ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream?
The purpose of the custom issue template is not explicitly stated in the provided text. The 'about' field is empty, indicating that the purpose has not been described.
What is the title of the custom issue template in ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream?
The title of the custom issue template is currently empty, as indicated by the '' value in the 'title' field.
Which labels are assigned to the custom issue template in ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream?
No labels are currently assigned to the custom issue template, as indicated by the '' value in the 'labels' field.
Who are the assignees for the custom issue template in ComfyUI-Hangover-Moondream?
There are no assignees currently specified for the custom issue template, as indicated by the '' value in the 'assignees' field.
Is the purpose of the custom issue template described in the provided text?
No, the purpose of the custom issue template is not described in the provided text. The 'about' field is empty.
Does the custom issue template have a title?
No, the custom issue template does not have a title. The 'title' field is empty.
Are there any labels or assignees specified for the custom issue template?
No, there are no labels or assignees specified for the custom issue template. Both the 'labels' and 'assignees' fields are empty.
